sense.def: Pathological Condition of huang dan 病患惛惛饒睡，四肢疼痛，面目俱黃，舌上紫色，甚則 舌面坼裂，及加黑色，此是走精黃 , yellow dan -illness, with face and eyes all yellow, dizziness and sleepiness, the four limbs in pain, the tongue purple and its surface with fissures. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 61: 病患惛惛饒睡，四肢疼痛，面目俱黃，舌上紫色，甚則 舌面坼裂，及加黑色，此是走精黃 , “ When one suffers from dizziness and sleepiness, the four limbs being in pain, face and eyes being all yellow, and a purple color on the tongue, and in severe cases the tongue surface developing fissures and an additional black color, this is running-essence yellow ”.
